title: Seeking Shadows
description: What if the woman I fell for was in love with someone else? The man who claimed her heart is my VP, the same man I need to respect and follow his orders. But now that I'm no longer a prospect, it's difficult to find my place. What if I donâ€™t want to play by the club rules anymore? But then again, what if while I'm seeking shadows, I find something I wasn't prepared for? And the darkness leaves me fighting for everything I thought I'd never have... Seeking Shadows is a part of The Royal Bastards MC Author Collaboration and is book three in the Tampa, FL Series.
author: K.E. Osborn
